mapper.sql: p.id, p.name, p.number, p.orPrice, p.region, p.nowPrice, p.addTime, p.auditStatus, p.state, p.imageTitle, p.placeOrigin, p.brand_id,p.type_id, p.texture, p.weight, p.unit, p.synopsis, p.description, p.inventory, p.sales,p.images, b.name brandName, pt.name typeName, pk.id pkId,pk.keyword
mapper.select:
select
from products p,brand b,producttype pt,productKeyword pk where p.brand_id=b.id and p.type_id=pt.id and p.id=pk.product_id and p.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select p.* from products p,brand b,productKeyword pk,productType pt where p.type_id=pt.id and p.brand_id=b.id and p.id=pk.product_id and p.state=1
and p.name like '%${name}%'
and b.name = #{brand.name}
and pt.name= #{productType.name}
and pk.keyword like '%${productKeyword.keyword}%'
order by p.nowPrice asc
order by p.sales desc

select id, name, number, orPrice, region, nowPrice, addTime, auditStatus, state, imageTitle, placeOrigin, type_id, brand_id, texture, weight, unit, synopsis, images, description, inventory, sales, paral1, paral2, paral3, paral4, paral5, paral6, paral7, paral8, paral9, paral10, paral11, paral12, paral13, paral14, paral15, paral16, paral17 from products

select
from products p,brand b,producttype pt,productKeyword pk
and p.brand_id=b.id and p.type_id=pt.id and p.id=pk.product_id

select id, name, number, orPrice, region, nowPrice, addTime, auditStatus, state, imageTitle, placeOrigin, type_id, brand_id, texture, weight, unit, synopsis, images, description, inventory, sales, paral1, paral2, paral3, paral4, paral5, paral6, paral7, paral8, paral9, paral10, paral11, paral12, paral13, paral14, paral15, paral16, paral17 from products
and imageTitle like '%${imagetitle}%'
ORDER BY sales desc
ORDER BY nowPrice asc
